CRYSTAL BEASLEY

pixels on thread

testing testing 1, 2, 3

Is this thing on?

This project to document put pixels on thread is by Crystal Beasley a.k.a. @skinny. I have a lifelong fascination with behavior and ritual, especially those where the participants reach some trance-like state. I experienced this firsthand in the form of speaking in tongues as a member of a fundamentalist church in the American South. These images capture a moment of transcendence.

I to hear from you:
